poem:
### The Geometry of Being

Luke, observe the design—  
A singular line through the center,  
A testament to balance:  
One nose, one button of birth,  
Yet in the mirroring world,  
Two eyes to see, two hands  
To hold, two feet to wander.  
Nature, a complex symmetry,  
Rests its secrets in simplicity,  
A child's question, an echo in silence.
